### What specific problem are you facing?
Describe your issue clearly (include step-by-step actions you took and what happened):
1. I tried to [e.g. run an assess on a Python project]
2. I expected [e.g. the assessment to finish in 2 minutes and show high-risk vulnerabilities]
3. Instead, [e.g. the assess got stuck at 50% / returned no results / showed an error message: "XXXXX"]
